inline_schema.name: get_ec2_details
inline_schema.description: Get EC2 instance details including VPC, subnet, security groups, public IP, private IP, and state

inline_schema.name: check_internet_gateway
inline_schema.description: Check if a VPC has an Internet Gateway attached and return the IGW ID if present

vpc_id.description: The VPC ID to check for Internet Gateway (e.g., vpc-0f80cb9c14c6a5ca7)

inline_schema.name: check_route_table
inline_schema.description: Check route table for a subnet and determine if it has routes to Internet Gateway or NAT Gateway

subnet_id.description: The subnet ID to check route table for (e.g., subnet-xxxxx)

inline_schema.name: check_security_group
inline_schema.description: Check security group ingress and egress rules to determine if outbound internet traffic is allowed

security_group_id.description: The security group ID to check (e.g., sg-xxxxx)
